title: Enhance speed, privacy and security of your browser

actions.value:
Enhanced your web browsing experience

Added [uBlock Origin](https://github.com/gorhill/uBlock) to block ads and tracking. Speeds up browsing, improves security and privacy. If you want to allow ads on a certain page, visit [this help article](https://support.itsolver.net/hc/en-au/articles/115005641043).

## Enhanced your web browsing experience
Added [uBlock Origin](https://github.com/gorhill/uBlock) to block ads and tracking. Speeds up browsing, improves security and privacy. If you want to allow ads on a certain page, visit [this help article](https://support.itsolver.net/hc/en-au/articles/115005641043).
